rev.desc.rev.desc: A typo in ocm.lock was causing records processed by this application to remain locked forever. Modified so that ocm.lock is no longer used. Instead, lock is directly called with panels init.fc and call.application. $L.lock.name is set up by the "tag" rtecall and is used instead of $ocmmsglck.
event.not.found removed from process flow to eliminate numerous messages indicating that no event was found for the current state/transition.

descript.descript: A typo in ocm.lock was causing records processed by this application to remain locked forever. Modified so that ocm.lock is no longer used. Instead, lock is directly called with panels init.fc and call.application. $L.lock.name is set up by the "tag" rtecall and is used instead of $ocmmsglck.
event.not.found removed from process flow to eliminate numerous messages indicating that no event was found for the current state/transition.
